title: When the Peak Meets Peak Crazy - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Bickering Couple   Family   Ghosts   Part-Time Job   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Smart Couple   System Administrator   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 春风遥
description:
Fang Shan is a system, one day on a mission to find the wrong host after getting drunk. 

As the future heir of the Wei family, Wei Su Shen has a ruthless attitude and is a big brother sought after by countless people.

Until one day – 

[ Fang Shan: Although you are just a rookie today, you can still soar into the nine heavens tomorrow! ]
Wei Su Shen: …… 

[ Fang Shan: I guarantee that those who looked down on you and persecuted you in the past will all pay the price! ]

Wei Su Shen: …… 

Later, Wei Su Shen, who was already at the top of his life, was forced to stand at the top of the world. 

[Fang Shan: Now dear host, please shout our slogan in front of everyone!] 

Wei Su Shen: …… Don't, don't discriminate against a poor young man.

Crowd: No! Shame!!!>
